title: Naana Thaana Veena Ponaa Lyrics Thaana Serndha Koottam
stanzas:
oru pattaampoochiya
vittaa paaru da
ettaadha dhoorathula (2)

hey naanaa thaanaa
veenaa ponaa sariye illaiye
ada aanaa oonaa kaanaa ponaa
vazhiye illaiye

oru kutti size-u
bussu vaanam koluththi
nenju naduvula
niruthittaa oruthi

oru pattaampoochiya
vittaa paaru da
ettaadha dhoorathula

oru kattukopaananvana thaan kadathi
nenja dhoosi thatti
eduthu thaan niruthi

ippo neraa ulla vandhu
deraa poda poraaa
dhaaralama oruthi

adiyae
munnala porava
pinnala paakadha
azhagae
andha kannala paakura
saakkula thaakadha (2)

hey naana thaana
naanaa thaanaa
veenaa ponaa sariye illaiye
ada aanaa oonaa
kaanaa ponaa
vazhiye illaiye

kittathatta keranguren
keela eranguraen
konjam kolambi tholaiyuren

yedaakooda nelivaiyum
ava polivaiyum
paaththu polambi tholaiyuren

summave sirikuraen
summave sirikuraen
mela parakkuren
neja vayasa marakkuren

konalathaan nadakkuraen
kova kurukkuraen
aana manasa maraikkuren

adiyae
munnala porava
pinnala paakadha
azhagae
andha kannala paakura
saakkula thaakadha (2)

hey naanaa thaanaa
veenaa ponaa sariye illaiye
ada aanaa oonaa kaanaa ponaa
vazhiye illaiye

oru kutti size-u bussu
vaanam koluththi
nenju naduvula
niruthittaa oruthi

oru pattaampoochiya
vittaa paaru da
ettaadha dhoorathula

oru kattukopaananvana thaan kadathi
nenja dhoosi thatti
eduthu thaan niruthi

ippo neraa ulla vandhu
deraa poda poraaa
dhaaralama oruthi

adiyae
munnala porava
pinnala paakadha
azhagae
andha kannala paakura
saakkula thaakadha (2)
